benchmark_details.name: Speech-IFEval
benchmark_details.overview: Speech-IFEval is an evaluation framework designed to assess instruction-following capabilities and quantify catastrophic forgetting in speech-aware language models (SLMs).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of the benchmark is to evaluate the instruction-following capabilities of SLMs and systematically measure the impact of catastrophic forgetting during their development.

data.source: Closed-ended questions, creative writing, and chain-of-thought tasks sourced from established speech-instruction benchmarks.

methodology.calculation: The IFrate is calculated as the average following rate across three task categories.
methodology.interpretation: Higher IFrate indicates a modelâ€™s stronger capability to follow directives accurately.
